title: Russia detains suspect in car bomb attack that killed general
snippets: The FSB say they detained a "Ukrainian special services agent". Kyiv has not commented on the attack.
titles: Russia detains suspect in car bomb attack that killed general
summary: The FSB announced the detention of an individual claimed to be an agent of the Ukrainian special services. As of now, there has been no official response or comment from Kyiv regarding the incident.

title: Russia claims it has regained full control of Kursk from Ukraine
snippets: Ukraine denies Russian claims it has been forced out of the border region.
titles: Russia claims it has regained full control of Kursk from Ukraine
summary: Ukraine has refuted Russian allegations suggesting that Ukrainian forces have been expelled from a contested border area. This denial directly challenges Russia's claims about gaining control over the region, indicating ongoing disputes and conflict over territorial control. The current status remains that Ukraine contests Russia's assertions, maintaining that their forces have not been forced out.

title: Moment driver sees huge explosion rip through Iran port
snippets: At least four people have been killed and 500 more injured in Bandar Abbas.
titles: Moment driver sees huge explosion rip through Iran port
summary: At least four individuals have died and another 500 have been injured in Bandar Abbas. The incident marks a significant and tragic event in the area, though the cause of the injuries and fatalities has not been detailed in the provided information.

title: Chris Eubank Jr beats Conor Benn on unanimous points decision
snippets: Fierce rivals go the distance in middleweight bout as their famous fathers watch on at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
titles: Chris Eubank Jr beats Conor Benn on unanimous points decision
summary: In a highly anticipated middleweight bout at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, fierce rivals competed intensely, with the match going the full distance. The event was notably attended by their famous fathers, adding to the spectacle. The outcome of the fight was not provided in the details shared.

title: Thirteen killed, dozens under rubble as Israel bombs Gaza amid food crisis
snippets: Entire Strip, with a population of two million people, may be on the brink of famine as WFP runs out of supplies.
titles: Thirteen killed, dozens under rubble as Israel bombs Gaza amid food crisis
summary: The entire Strip, home to two million individuals, faces a potential famine crisis as the World Food Programme (WFP) reports running out of supplies. This situation puts the population at significant risk of food scarcity.

title: Did Michigan football DB, West Bloomfield product Makari Paige get drafted?
snippets: Makari Paige appeared in 53 games during his tenure in Ann Arbor, was a captain in 2024 and had a game-changing pick the final time he suited up.
titles: Did Michigan football DB, West Bloomfield product Makari Paige get drafted?
summary: Makari Paige, who played in 53 games for Ann Arbor, served as a team captain in 2024. In his final game, Paige made a significant impact with a game-changing interception.

title: Derek Carr to start if healthy, but Saints still waiting for word on shoulder injury
snippets: The Saints picked Tyler Shough in the second round.
titles: Derek Carr to start if healthy, but Saints still waiting for word on shoulder injury
summary: The New Orleans Saints selected quarterback Tyler Shough in the second round of the NFL Draft. This move aims to strengthen their quarterback position and add depth to the team's roster.

titles: Kentucky football players in 2025 NFL Draft: Maxwell Hairston, Deone Walker to Buffalo

title: Republicans plan to scrap US audit regulator
snippets: Proposal to fold the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board into the SEC will boost Donald Trump’s deregulatory agenda
titles: Republicans plan to scrap US audit regulator
summary: A proposal has been made to integrate the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) into the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This move aligns with Donald Trump's broader deregulatory agenda, aiming to streamline financial oversight and regulation processes.

title: China seizes disputed reef in the South China Sea
snippets: Sandy Cay is just kilometres from the Philippines’ military outpost at Thitu Island
titles: China seizes disputed reef in the South China Sea
summary: Sandy Cay, located just kilometers away from the Philippines' military outpost on Thitu Island, is a point of geographical and strategic interest due to its proximity to a significant military location.

title: Kremlin claims to have pushed Ukraine out of Kursk as Trump criticises Putin
snippets: Russia acknowledges presence of North Korean troops on the ground for the first time
titles: Kremlin claims to have pushed Ukraine out of Kursk as Trump criticises Putin
summary: For the first time, Russia has officially acknowledged the presence of North Korean troops on its territory. This marks a significant development, as it is the first official confirmation of North Korean military personnel being active in Russia. The implications and reasons behind this presence have not been detailed in the acknowledgment.

title: Trump and Zelenskyy hold ‘productive’ discussion at Pope’s funeral
snippets: World leaders gathered in Rome as US and Ukrainian presidents met for first time since Oval Office row
titles: Trump and Zelenskyy hold ‘productive’ discussion at Pope’s funeral
summary: World leaders convened in Rome, marking the first meeting between the US and Ukrainian presidents since their disagreement in the Oval Office. This gathering signifies a step towards diplomatic engagement following the tension.

title: DeepMind UK staff seek to unionise and challenge defence deals and Israel links
snippets: Move by employees at Google’s AI arm follows discontent after weapons and surveillance pledge is dropped
titles: DeepMind UK staff seek to unionise and challenge defence deals and Israel links
summary: Employees at Google's AI division have expressed dissatisfaction and taken action following the company's decision to abandon a pledge against developing AI for weapons and surveillance purposes. This move by the staff indicates a significant level of concern over the ethical implications of the company's change in policy.

title: Less intensive farming works best for agricultural soil
snippets: The less intensively you manage the soil, the better the soil can function. Such as not plowing as often or using more grass-clover mixtures as cover crops. Surprisingly, it applies to both conventional and organic farming.
titles: Less intensive farming works best for agricultural soil
summary: Research indicates that minimal soil management improves its functionality, benefiting both conventional and organic farming. Techniques such as reducing plowing frequency and utilizing grass-clover mixtures as cover crops enhance soil health.
